comment: Note: this key should be used exclusively, and not with other keys in the visibility property of a field.
description: Visible from the API, but not in the UI, not visible in the columns selector; shown if the * selector is used
title: Visible on the API only

description: Visible as part of the standard complete report
title: Report View

comment: Note: this key should be used exclusively, and not with other keys in the visibility property of a field.
description: Not visible by default, not visible in the UI columns selector, not shown when includes * selector is used; only visible when in the manual includes
title: Not visible by default

description: Allow visibility in the lists in edit mode
title: Visible in edit list view

description: Allow visibility in the edit form when creating.
title: Visible when creating

description: String fields may contain any characters
title: String

description: Decimal - float value with precision specified
title: Decimal

comment: This value will actually be the URI that serves the image.
title: Image

description: A numeric value that is displayed with SI units and prefix
title: SI Unit

description: An array of nested ApiLog comments
title: ApiLog Comment Array

description: Display text in a wrapping text cell
title: Long String Cell

description: Select a single value from a controlled vocabulary
title: Select

description: Checkbox select multiple values from a controlled vocabulary
title: Multi-select

comment: A custom UI element will be used to edit this field
title: Custom

comment: Screen data is private, and does not belong to the user; User or Screen is level 2 (mutual/overlapping) but other screen is not overlapping.
description: User has no access to this resource based on users data sharing level and resource data sharing level
title: Not Visible

comment: Screen is overlapping/mutual and user is level 1 or 2, User is level 2 (mutual/overlapping sharing) and screeen is overlapping.
description: Shared because screen is overlapping with user's screens
title: Shared Overlapping

comment: Both user and screen are level 1
description: Visible between sharing (level 1 users and screens), or for level 0 screens
title: Shared Mutually

comment: Own screens and public (level 0) screens; admin view privelege
description: Full Visibility - Own Screens, admin view
title: Full Visibility

description: Submitted - background processor has queued the job
title: Submitted
